reviewText: very disappointed with supplier..wrote to say this would not play on (She's 82 year old) mothers DVD player (but did on one of mine out of 3) but they would not return my note...would like to return it or someting...a lot to pay for a movie that can't be watched!!
One of the crappiest movies ever to come out of Korea. Don't waste your time or money.
I loved this drama. I liked the romance,confusion,life and hilarity. I watched it more then ten times and laughed each time,cried and was caught in its web. Try it and see for yourself.

I've been watching this drama on netflix and love it.  So I decided to purchase the dvd. I picked this one since it was affordable.  However, the quality of the picture is sub par.  The movements reminds me of the way silent movies were done.  It's giving me a headache.  The subtitles are also not the best they are chunky and reminds me of space invader characters..  I like the subtitles from the netflix version better.  I'll probably purchase a better quality version of this dvd.  I'll pay more but it will be worth it.
